on.from sentence: In this subsection , we conduct extensive experiments and ablation studies on the WIDER FACE dataset to evaluate the effectiveness of several contributions of our proposed framework , including feature enhance module , progressive anchor loss , and improved anchor matching .

our feature enhance module.from sentence:
Feature Enhance Module First ,
shows that our feature enhance module can improve VGG16 - based FSSD from 92.6 % , 90.2 % , 79.1 % to 93.0 % , 91.4 % , 84.6 % .

our progressive anchor loss.from sentence:
Progressive Anchor Loss Second , we use Res50 - based FSSD as the baseline to add progressive anchor loss for comparison .
shows our progressive anchor loss can improve Res50 - based FSSD using FEM from 95.0 % , 94.1 % , 88.0 % to 95.3 % , 94.4 % , 88.6 % .

our improved anchor matching.from sentence:
Improved Anchor Matching
shows that our improved anchor matching can improve Res101 based FSSD using FEM from 95.8 % , 95.1 % , 89.7 % to 96.1 % , 95.2 % , 90.0 % .
